# Unity-generated files and directories
[Ll]ibrary/
[Tt]emp/
[Oo]bj/
[Bb]uild/
[Bb]uilds/
[Ll]ogs/
[Mm]emoryCaptures/

# Autogenerated VS/MD/Jetbrains Rider project files
*.csproj
*.unityproj
*.sln
*.suo
*.tmp
*.user
*.userprefs
*.pidb
*.booproj
*.svd
*.pdb
*.opendb
*.VC.db

# Unity Package Manager
Packages/manifest.json
Packages/packages-lock.json

# Asset meta data should only be ignored when the corresponding asset is also ignored
!Assets/**/*.meta

# Hidden meta files
*.pidb.meta
*.pdb.meta

# User-specific settings
UserSettings/

# Crash reports
crashreports/

# Build artifacts
*.apk
*.aab
*.unitypackage
